info.title: GeoDB
info.description: The GeoDB API focuses on getting global city and region data. Filter cities by name prefix, country, location, time-zone, and even minimum population. Sort cities by name, country code, elevation, and population - or any combination of these. Get all country regions and all cities in a region.

get.description: Find administrative divisions, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known divisions.
Find administrative divisions near the given origin division, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known divisions.
Find cities near the given administrative division, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known cities.
Find cities, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known cities.
Find cities near the given origin city, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known cities.
Find administrative divisions near the given location, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known divisions.
Find cities near the given location, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known cities.
Get the details for a specific administrative division, including location coordinates, population, and elevation above sea-level (if available).
Get the details for a specific city, including location coordinates, population, and elevation above sea-level (if available).
Get distance from the given city.
Get city date-time.
Get the details for the containing populated place (e.g., its county or other administrative division), including location coordinates, population, and elevation above sea-level (if available).
Get city time.
Find countries, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known countries.
Get the details for a specific country, including number of regions.
Get all regions in a specific country. These could be states, provinces, districts, or otherwise major political divisions.
Get the details of a specific country region, including number of cities.
Get the administrative divisions in a specific country region. The country and region info is omitted in the response. .
Get the cities in a specific country region. The country and region info is omitted in the response. .
Find currencies, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known currencies.
Get all supported languages.
Get all known locales.
Get all known time-zones.
Get time-zone.
Get time-zone date-time.
Get time-zone time.

currencyCodes.title: Currency Codes
currencyCodes.description: A list of supported ISO-4217 currency codes.

currencyCodes.title: Currency Codes
currencyCodes.description: A list of supported ISO-4217 currency codes.

numRegions.title: Number of Regions
numRegions.description: The number of regions in this country.

countryCodes.title: Country Codes
countryCodes.description: A list of ISO-3166 country codes of countries supporting this currency.

Error.title: Error
Error.description: An error that occurred processing the request.

ErrorCode.title: ErrorCode
ErrorCode.description: One of a set of enumerated error codes representing the types of errors that can occur processing a request .

LanguageDescriptor.title: Language
LanguageDescriptor.description: A language supported by the service.

Locale.title: Locale
Locale.description: A locale representing a language/region combination.

Metadata.title: Metadata
Metadata.description: Result metadata (currently only associated with collection results).

currentOffset.title: Current Offset
currentOffset.description: The zero-ary offset into the results (0 is the first result).

totalCount.title: Total Count
totalCount.description: The total number of results across pages.

deleted.title: Whether Deleted
deleted.description: If this place has been soft-deleted.

elevationMeters.title: Elevation in Meters
elevationMeters.description: The place elevation (meters) above sea level.

regionCode.title: Region Code
regionCode.description: The ISO or FIPS region code.

distance.description: Included if this is the result of a distance query.

regionCode.title: Region Code
regionCode.description: The ISO or FIPS region code.

PopulatedPlaceType.description: One of a set of enumerated populated-place types known by the service (currently only level-2 admin divisions and cities) .

capital.title: Capital
capital.description: The region's capital city (varies by languageCode).

numCities.title: Number of Cities
numCities.description: The number of cities in this region.

rawUtcOffsetHours.title: Offset from UTC
rawUtcOffsetHours.description: The number of hours this time-zone is offset from UTC.

BaseCollectionResponse.title: Base Collection Response
BaseCollectionResponse.description: Common properties for all collection  responses.

data.description: The date-time in ISO-6801 format: yyyyMMdd'T'HHmmssZ.

DistanceResponse.title: Distance Response
DistanceResponse.description: A decimal distance (in miles or kilometers).

data.description: The distance in units as set by the distanceUnit param (defaults to miles).

LanguagesResponse.title: Languages Response
LanguagesResponse.description: A list of languages supported by the system.

data.description: The time in ISO-8601 format: HHmmss.SSSZ

rawUtcOffsetHours.description: The number of hours this time-zone is offset from UTC.

path.countryId.name: countryId
path.countryId.description: An ISO-3166 country code or WikiData ID.

query.entity.namePrefix.name: namePrefix
query.entity.namePrefix.description: Only entities whose names start with this prefix. If languageCode is set, the prefix will be matched on the name as it appears in that language.

query.entity.namePrefixDefaultLangResult.name: namePrefixDefaultLangResults
query.entity.namePrefixDefaultLangResult.description: When name-prefix matching, whether or not to match on names in the default language if a non-default languageCode is set.

query.distanceUnit.name: distanceUnit
query.distanceUnit.description: The unit of distance: MI | KM.

query.place.countryIds.name: countryIds
query.place.countryIds.description: Only places in these countries (comma-delimited country codes or WikiData IDs).

query.place.excludedCountryIds.name: excludedCountryIds
query.place.excludedCountryIds.description: Only places NOT in these countries (comma-delimited country codes or WikiData IDs).

query.place.location.id.name: location
query.place.location.id.description: Only places near this location. Latitude/longitude in ISO-6709 format: ±DD.DDDD±DDD.DDDD

query.place.location.radiusOf.name: radius
query.place.location.radiusOf.description: The location radius within which to find places.

query.place.minPopulation.name: minPopulation
query.place.minPopulation.description: Only places having at least this population.

query.place.maxPopulation.name: maxPopulation
query.place.maxPopulation.description: Only places having no more than this population.

query.place.types.name: types
query.place.types.description: Only places for these types (comma-delimited): CITY | ADM2.

query.place.sort.name: sort
query.place.sort.description: How to sort place results.  'Format: ±SORT_FIELD,±SORT_FIELD'  where SORT_FIELD = countryCode | elevation | name | population .

query.place.sort.withinRegion.name: sort
query.place.sort.withinRegion.description: How to sort place results.  'Format: ±SORT_FIELD,±SORT_FIELD'  where SORT_FIELD = elevation | name | population .

path.regionCode.name: regionCode
path.regionCode.description: An ISO-3166 or FIPS region code.

query.limit.name: limit
query.limit.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve.

query.offset.name: offset
query.offset.description: The zero-ary offset index into the results.

query.sort.name: sort
query.sort.description: How to sort place results.  'Format: ±SORT_FIELD,±SORT_FIELD'  where SORT_FIELD = countryCode | elevation | name | population .

query.includeDeleted.name: includeDeleted
query.includeDeleted.description: Whether to include any divisions marked deleted: ALL | SINCE_YESTERDAY | SINCE_LAST_WEEK | NONE.

Distance.description: A decimal distance (in miles or kilometers).

Languages.description: A list of languages supported by the system.
